message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. This product is worth $1200000 to you and I am offering it to you at a special price of $1350000. My goal is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, and I believe this offer strikes a balance that respects the intrinsic worth of the product while offering you a competitive advantage. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to your positive response.
